name: An Amazing Wizard
storyline:
You are a magical kid of prophecy who is born once in a millennium and was raised in the wizards village. You are unable to cast spells on your own, but when you think about casting a spell, Magic Hands appear and cast the spell for you!

The evil forces of the void were so frightened by your power that they kidnapped you and erased your memories. They have placed you in their mysterious Magic Realm which is constantly changing. Reclaim your memories, learn the whole truth about your power and free yourself from this world!
summary: An Amazing Wizard is a 2D fast-paced, metroidvania inspired roguelite. You'll explore procedurally generated magical worlds with over 250 Artifacts, more than 100 Spells and dozens of Magic Weapons to unlock and use. After every death you'll respawn in a different world. There are no checkpoints...
